settings.profile.title: アカウント

settings.profile.allowImpersonation.desc: Enable this option to allow UnieVerse™ Cloud administrators to temporarily access your account for troubleshooting and support purposes. This helps them quickly identify and resolve any issues you may encounter.
setting.profile.generateAPIkey: Generate and manage API keys to access the API/CLI
setting.profile.generateKey.descript': Create a new API key for accessing the API. You can set an expiration date and a custom prefix for better organization.
setting.profile.generateKey.name: Name
setting.profile.generateKey.rateLimit.en: Limit the number of requests within a time window
setting.profile.generateKey.rateLimit.wi: The duration in which requests are counted
setting.profile.generateKey.rateLimit.ma: Maximum number of requests allowed within the time window
